mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dance Travel", "Changing Attitudes", "Which Direction to Turn?", "India Diary", "SIO Scholarship Winners", "Vox Saltatoris: The Square Dancer Speaks Up", "Quarterly Movement Report" and "30th National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Contra Corner", "Experimental Notes", "Traditional Treasury", "Advanced Dancing", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Discovery", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
